data.message: Gensu dean Apollo brown phonte PushaT  chubby jag Cassidy papoose Joel's ortiz horseshoe gang members yeah them dudes  can kill eminem career yet eminem aint all that great he sucks and overrated

replies.message: Lmao. Your punk ass came to an Eminem page to hype some nobodies and talk shit about the greatest rapper ever? GTFO of here with that bullshit.
Greatest rapper ever? GTFOH with that bullshit

I listen to Joel Ortiz, I listen to horseshoe gang and crooked i, I listen to some of the other mentioned artist as well. And on a TECHNICAL level of wordplay the eminem we know holds the crown. And not the recovery eminem, you should know what I mean.
